wordGroup: time inconsistency 时间不一致性，时间矛盾

sentences.en: UR ensures the highest level of performance at the cost of some data inconsistency.
sentences.cn: UR 以牺牲某些数据的不一致性为代价，确保了最高级别的性能。

sentences.en: His worst fault was his inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 他的最大缺点就是反复无常。

sentences.en: There is some inconsistency between the witnesses' evidence and their earlier statements.
sentences.cn: 证人的证据与他们先前的证词有些出入。
